alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 6:44PM MDT until July 04 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Teller County in central Colorado... West central El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 644 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Colorado Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Fountain, Manitou Springs, Stratmoor, Schriever AFB, Fort Carson, Security, Peterson AFB, Security-Widefield, Falcon, Cimarron Hills and Cascade. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
